PyISY Documentation¶

Project Information¶

Project Page: Automicus
News: Automicus Blog
Source: GitHub

Installation¶

The easiest way to install this package is using pip with the command:

pip install PyISY

Requirements¶

This package requires two other packages, also available from pip. They are installed automatically when PyISY is installed using pip.

  • requests
  • VarEvents
